name: aaronos_music
description: Music Player and Visualizer written in JavaScript

scripts.package-win-cli: electron-packager . aaronos_music --overwrite --asar=true --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --icon=win_icon.ico --prune=true --out=release-builds --version-string.CompanyName="Aaron Adams" --version-string.FileDescription="Music Player from AaronOS" --version-string.ProductName="AaronOS Music" --ignore=node_modules

author: Aaron Adams
